title: Add tenant-level compliance configuration for content generation & communications data

sections.text: Introduce a tenant-level compliance settings object that controls whether AI content generation is enabled, what communications data sources/fields can be ingested, and required defaults for regulated environments. Expose the configuration via an internal admin endpoint (and persisted storage) so implementations can be completed without custom code changes. Ensure the runtime checks these settings to hard-block disallowed generation and data ingestion paths.
